query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'tracks' AND DATA_TYPE IN ('text', 'mediumtext', 'longtext')
